#summary Description of exception-test.

= Introduction =

exception-test provides a testing framework. This framework makes it possible to test if methods throw exceptions.

= Details =

== Package Detail ==

exception-test provides an interface and a class in package `org.effrafax.test`
  * `interface ExceptionInvoker`
  * `class ExceptionTester`

== Usage ==

The `ExceptionTester` class has a public static method `testForException`. This method has two arguments of type `Class<?>` and `ExceptionInvoker`. The `invoke` method of `ExceptionInvoker` is called by `testForException`.
It is expected that this call will throw an exception which is of the same class as specified. 

== Example ==

In the following example `ExceptionTester` is used to test itself. The arguments of `testForException` should not be `null`. Via an anonymous class instantiation an implentation of `ExceptionInvoker` is given.
{{{
ExceptionTester.testForException(
    IllegalArgumentException.class, 
    new ExceptionInvoker() {

        @Override
        public void invoke() throws Exception {

            ExceptionTester.testForException(null, null);			
        }				
    }
);
}}}
